RdfApi
Class RdfParser

java.lang.Object
  RdfApi.RdfParser

public class RdfParser
extends java.lang.Object

A class for parsing an RDF based GRR input file. The class can output all of the relevant objects in order to use the GRR Java layer for generating random RDF data

          Constructor - Only initializes the array-list of construction-wrappers
